Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: James C. Ward "horror and sci-fi fan.."
Reviews.Content: just bought this 2 days ago.  Easy to set-up, easy to install.  But best of all, is the crystal clear picture in high definition.  It's like having a cinema screen in your living room.* highly recommended *

Reviews.Title: great price, no issues
Reviews.Author: Salil Singh
Reviews.Content: I got this for my parents who live in India. Was wary at first because of the PAL/NTSC issues and lack of ability to test out the product while in the US. Also, people I spoke to warned me that there cd. be issues with the compatibility in India. However, it all worked out perfectly and my parents have now been enjoying the product for several months back in their home in  New Delhi, for at least 30% savings on the cost compared to what they wd. have paid there.

Multi System Pal/NTSC 110V to 240V for Worldwide Use
